repos_data.description: C++ logging library. It is powerful, supports asynchronous low latency, extendable, light-weight, fast performing, thread and type safe and consists of many built-in features. It provides ability to write logs in your own customized format. It also provide support for logging your classes, third-party libraries, STL and third-party containers etc.
Golang errors with stack trace and source fragments.
Simple, portable, and self-contained stacktrace library for C++11 and newer
Drop-in replacement for the standard library errors package and github.com/pkg/errors
Cross-Platform, Efficient easy to integrate crash reporting library for modern C++
A logging library with strack traces, object dumping and optional timestamps
